header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: Cache-Control

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.name: Date

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

query.description: 非必需，每一页文章数，默认15
非必需，类别id，一级类别和二级类别均可，0表示无限制
非必需，默认为id，可选列表：'updated_at', 'created_at', 'reply_count', 'favorite_count', 'like_count','view_count'
非必需，默认为空，可选：me,user,organization,或空
非必需，当author_type为空或为me时该项可为空
每一页文章数，默认15 (所有字段均可空)
类别id，一级类别和二级类别均可，0表示无限制

formdata.description: 非必需，article_id和reply_id仅输入几个，当有reply_id时，认为这是回复留言，此时若存在article_id，则article_id必须与reply_id对应的reply对应的文章id一致。

header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

formdata.description: 非必需，article_id和reply_id不可同时为空

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest
